description: LoadBalancerIngress represents the status of a load-balancer ingress point: traffic intended for the service should be sent to an ingress point.

hostname.description: Hostname is set for load-balancer ingress points that are DNS based (typically AWS load-balancers)

ip.description: IP is set for load-balancer ingress points that are IP based (typically GCE or OpenStack load-balancers)

ports.description: Ports is a list of records of service ports If used, every port defined in the service should have an entry in it

error.description:
Error is to record the problem with the service port The format of the error shall comply with the following rules: - built-in error values shall be specified in this file and those shall use
  CamelCase names
- cloud provider specific error values must have names that comply with the
  format foo.example.com/CamelCase.

port.description: Port is the port number of the service port of which status is recorded here

protocol.description: Protocol is the protocol of the service port of which status is recorded here The supported values are: "TCP", "UDP", "SCTP"
